SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO COMMUNITY (com_no, member_no, com_title, com_content, com_views, com_created_at) VALUES (#{comNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT com_no, member_no, com_title, com_content, com_views, com_created_at FROM COMMUNITY

SELECT c.com_no as com_no, c.com_title as com_title, c.com_content as com_content, c.com_views as com_views, c.com_created_at as com_created_at, m.member_num as member_no, m.member_name as member_name FROM community c INNER JOIN member m ON c.member_no = m.member_num WHERE c.com_no=#{comNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET com_views=com_views+1 WHERE com_no=#{comNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.com_no) FROM COMMUNITY C
mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum , subq.* FROM ( SELECT C.com_no as com_no, C.com_title as com_title, C.com_content as com_content, C.com_views as com_views, C.com_created_at as com_created_at, M.member_num as member_no, M.member_name as member_name FROM community C INNER JOIN member M ON C.member_no = M.member_num ORDER BY com_no DESC ) subq WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{page} * #{size} ) ) WHERE rnum >= ((#{page} - 1) * #{size}) + 1
